post:
We from Serveo offer you over 15 years of experience and deliver you a rock solid customer satisfaction. Currently we offer the below configuration at € 24/y at limited time.

Our customers give us a five star overall client feedback score:
http://www.hostingreview.nl/providers/serveo
https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.serveo.nl

Our platform
During the development of our VPS platform reliability, scalability and speed were key factors. A VPS shouldn't relay on hardware load or hardware failure. This is why we developed a fully distributed cluster were all components have an active / active failover. We invested heavily in a SSD storage solution by Storpool and have active / active nodes based on KVM technology.

We accept BTC ₿₿₿ and CC payments
